attributes.action: Demand byelections of the 172 revolting Labour MPs to legitimise coup or resign
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn has a clear mandate from the members of his party, and the old guard of Blair's 'New Labour' & their centralist politics are the catalyst for an ineffectual opposition and do not reflect the mood of the U.K. We recognise Corbyn as TRUE Labour and demand the party be whipped to in line
